SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN event_level = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as common, SUM(CASE WHEN event_level = 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as more, SUM(CASE WHEN event_level = 9 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as major, SUM(CASE WHEN event_level = 10 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as especially_important, SUM(CASE WHEN event_level = 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as more FROM event_receive where verify_status IN(0,1)

SELECT T2.pt_id AS ptId, T2.pt_name AS ptName FROM ( SELECT @r AS _id, (SELECT @r := pt_parent_id FROM plan_type WHERE pt_id = _id) AS parent_id, @l := @l + 1 AS lvl FROM (SELECT @r := #{ptId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, @l := 0) vars, plan_type h WHERE @r <> 0) T1 JOIN plan_type T2 ON T1._id = T2.pt_id ORDER BY T1.lvl DESC LIMIT 1
